duties_responsibilities.duty: Write and coordinate proposals and manage the RFP process
Assist in the creation of sales collateral and coordinate pricing and information responses
Portal management and mailbox management, as well as Salesforce/STACCS updates and reporting
Provide new customer set-ups, including vendor onboarding and customer portal set-ups
Independently manage deadlines to ensure on-time delivery to customer requests and communicate with clients
Assist with licenses and insurance, as needed

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Business Administration, Finance, or related field (Master's preferred)
